contents.text: Thank you for calling Lightbend in San Francisco, where we help you modernize your enterprise at startup speed.
For information on our productivity tools and enterprise modernization solutions, press 1.
To speak with our sales and consulting experts, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with our sales and consulting team.

navigationGoals: I’m calling to speak with a sales consultant about your enterprise modernization services.
I want to speak with a consultant about using Lightbend’s enterprise modernization services for my veteran-owned startup.
I want to schedule a consultation on modernizing our monolithic app with reactive microservices.
I need help speaking with someone about purchasing their enterprise modernization services.
Ask about consulting services to integrate Lightbend’s tools into my physics research project

contents.text: For pricing details, trial requests, and product demonstrations, press 2.
One moment please, connecting you to pricing and demo services.

navigationGoals: I’d like pricing details and a demo of your productivity tools.
I’d like to get pricing information and arrange a demo of your productivity tools for my team.
I'd like to request pricing and a hands-on demo trial of Lightbend’s Akka Platform.
I’d like to find out pricing and schedule a demo for their productivity tools.
Request a student trial license and demo for the enterprise productivity tools

contents.text: To reach technical support or account services, press 2.
For technical support and troubleshooting assistance, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to technical support.

navigationGoals: I need technical support to troubleshoot an issue in our deployment.
I need help diagnosing an issue with my Akka-based service that keeps crashing in production.
I need technical support troubleshooting dead-letter queue errors in our Akka cluster.
I need technical support to troubleshoot an issue with my software.
Get help troubleshooting installation errors with Lightbend’s development toolkit for my lab environment

contents.text: For account management and billing inquiries, press 2.
One moment please, transferring you to account management.

navigationGoals: I have a billing question and need to speak with account management.
I need to update my billing details and review my current subscription plan.
I need to discuss our enterprise license renewal and review invoice discrepancies.
I want to discuss my account billing and update my payment details.
Confirm that my student discount has been applied correctly to my account billing
